property.name: descrip
property.value: Overall number of licenses (e.g., 3 GPL + 2 BSD4 licenses = 5 overall licenses)

property.name: description
property.value: Number of component licenses that are exactly the same as the target license

property.name: label
property.value: Number of equal licenses

property.name: description
property.value: Number of component licenses that are compatible, but not exatly the same, as the target license

property.name: label
property.value: Number of compatible licenses

property.name: description
property.value: Number of license types (e.g., 3 GPL + 2 BSD4 licenses = 2 license types)

property.name: label
property.value: Number of license types

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that two (or more) of the adopted components have licenses that are compatible with each other

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that the target license(s, in case of dual licensing) is incompatible with one or more of the component licenses

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that arises from the need to manage licenses that are compatible but different from each other, thus requiring special care

property.name: description
property.value: Risk due to the low degree of freedom in the choice of the target license
